title: Looking for people who are interested in playing ranked team XD. (A Bronze,Silver Team). We gonsmash
body:
___My in game name is : epicturtlez (Silver 4) Not the best. But I'd like to have a ranked team game this morning.
You could also add my friend : Fr0zen C0ke
We can sort out the roles for the team.
I personally main jungle and my friend mains top/adc.
But our roles are adjustable.
Add us xD.~~__~~

replies.body:
I'm happy to join if there's any openings: Mochi Berry Fox
Usually play supp, adc or mid, but can do my best to learn the other two if needed. i'm in Silv 3

I sent you an add, 

I Main Adc/Mid
Hey there, are you talking about joining the team 'The real bronzodia' or are you planning on started a new team?

Sure, add me - Munien

- Silver 5
- Main Mid/top/jg

{{champion:120}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:81}}
